userStories.title: Gemini Command: 7-Line Poem Generator
userStories.description: Create a Gemini command that generates a 7-line poem about a specified topic.
acceptanceCriteria: Takes a topic as a required argument.
Output is formatted as a clear, readable poem.

userStories.title: Gemini Command: Haiku Generator
userStories.description: Create a Gemini command that generates a haiku (5-7-5 syllable structure) about a specified topic.
acceptanceCriteria: Takes a topic as a required argument.
Output is formatted on three lines.

userStories.title: Gemini Command: Limerick Generator
userStories.description: Create a Gemini command that generates a humorous limerick about a specified topic.
acceptanceCriteria: Follows the AABBA rhyme scheme and traditional rhythm of a limerick.
Takes a topic as a required argument.

userStories.title: Refine Installer Defaults & Script Selection
userStories.description: Streamline the installation process by changing the default selections. Commands, Skills, and Extensions should be selected by default to encourage a complete setup. Scripts, being more specialized tools, should require explicit user selection via a granular list.
acceptanceCriteria: Commands, Skills, and Extensions are selected for installation by default.
The 'Scripts' category triggers a multi-select interface (e.g., checkbox list) showing all available scripts found in the `scripts/` directory.
Scripts are NOT selected by default in this list; the user must choose which ones they want.
The installation summary correctly reflects the specific scripts chosen.
